attributes.action: Stop Nick Clegg getting a knighthood
attributes.background: Nick Clegg is due to get a knighthood for his  achievements as deputy PM. He didn’t achieve anything positive in this time. He lied to the electorate in this time about tuition fees. He also introduced the bedroom tax which he had to back track on later. He also took the Lib Dem’s from 57 to 8 seats

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments.
